name: Gay Guys
description:
After many adventures in the Argania Kingdom, it's time to enjoy the hottest moments of our first stories (Yuki’s Tale, Agent Lovesdick, and Cumming Hotel). Using the keyboard to control the character, avoid the opponents who are moving around the screen. Your goal is to erase the mask to reveal the uncovered image. This game is inspired by casual games like Agar.Io and Snake.

Features


  • 3 types of enemies with different behaviors;
  • Sex Scenes Between Orcs And Humans;
  • Masturbation Scenes;
  • Fantastical Sex Scenes (sex with tentacles, slimes, and elves);
  • Steam Achievements;
  • Original Music;
  • Photo Gallery;
  • Cumming Gallery (complete the game and unlock ‘special’ scenes);
